import React from 'react' import {NavDropdown, useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) //prende le informazioni dell'utente dallo store const { userInfo } = userLogin return (
Proshop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( Login )} Link
) } export default Header
